identity.mission: Create a Modern Minimalist Digital Mosque Display that balances sacred serenity with digital precision. No clutter, high glanceability.

theme.description: A deep, restful dark mode optimized for low-light mosque environments and TV displays, with a high-contrast light mode option for bright daylight.

rules: No purple gradients. Use Deep Green or Slate gradients only.
High contrast is mandatory for TV display (WCAG AAA for main text).
Use Gold (#D97706) sparingly for active prayer times and urgent alerts.
Headings (Clock, Prayer Names) MUST use Barlow Condensed.
Minimum font size for TV display is 24px (text-2xl).
Use tabular-nums for all clocks and timers to prevent jitter.

modes.tv_display: Bento Grid Mode A (Tetris). Hero is the Clock/Next Prayer. Sidebar is Prayer List. Footer is Running Text.
modes.dashboard: Dense Grid Mode B. High density, clear hierarchy.

cards.style: Flat, high contrast borders in dark mode. Soft shadows in light mode.

buttons.style: Sharp or slightly rounded. High contrast.

assets.icons: Use Lucide React or Heroicons. Keep it simple and outlined.

rules: Use 'AnimatePresence' for smooth prayer time transitions.
Marquee text must move SLOWLY and SMOOTHLY (linear easing).
No heavy parallax or 3D effects to ensure performance on Android TV boxes.

accessibility.sizing: Large touch targets on dashboard. Massive text on TV.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. Setup Tailwind config with the custom colors and font families.
3. Create the 'TV Display' layout (/) using a Bento Grid with a focus on the Clock and Next Prayer.
4. Create the 'Dashboard' layout (/connect) using a sidebar + dense grid content area.
5. Use 'react-fast-marquee' for the running text footer.
6. Ensure all 'Date' and 'Time' displays use 'tabular-nums' class to avoid jitter.
7. Mock the Prayer Time API data initially, but structure it for easy KHGT integration.
8. Use the provided image URLs for the slideshow and backgrounds.
9. DO NOT use purple or teal gradients. Stick to the Deep Green/Gold/Slate palette.
10. For the Admin Dashboard, use Shadcn components but customize them to match the 'Outfit' font and rounded-lg style.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
